alfredsnippet.snippet:
"... it is perhaps not too surprising that when one approaches the limits of our knowledge, theologians and scientists alike tend to appeal to new hidden universes for, respectively, either redemption or understanding."

- Lawrence M. Krauss, Science and Religion Share Fascination in Things Unseen, NY Times, November 8, 2005
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Theologians and Scientists Find New Hidden Universes at the Limits of Our Knowledge
